data.name: errBadPasswordToChange
data.value: Incorrect password supplied; you must provide your current password in order to change it.

data.name: errNeedBothQandA
data.value: To change your secret question and answer, you must type BOTH a new question and a new answer

data.name: errPasswordsDontMatch

data.name: errPleaseTypeNewQandA

data.name: EndorsementDisclaimer
data.value: You can issue an endorsement to a student, or record an endorsement that you have given to a student off-line

data.name: EndorsementRequest
data.value: Let us know what we should add.

data.name: EndorsementRequestPrompt
data.value: Don't see a template you need?

data.name: EndorsementReturnToProfile
data.comment: Shown when there is an error.

data.name: errNoCFICertificate
data.value: You must have a CFI/CFII/GI certificate number in your profile in order to endorse students.

data.name: errNoCFIExpiration
data.value: You must provide an expiration date for your CFI/CFII/GI certificate in your profile in order to endorse students.

data.name: errNotAuthorizedToEndorse
data.value: You are not authorized to endorse this user. Please establish a student/instructor relationship first.

data.value: The specified email address was not found.

data.name: UnsubscribeSuccessful

data.value: You are not configured for Dropbox. Please set this up in your preferences (under Profile)

data.name: BasicMedErrMedicalNotFound
data.value: Need an FAA Medical dated on or after July 15, 2006

data.name: BasicMedErrNoMedicalCourseWithin2Years
data.value: Need to take a medical factors course

data.name: BasicMedErrNoPhysicalWithin4Years
data.value: Need a visit to a physician

data.name: BasicMedAttachDocumentation
data.value: Upload a photo or PDF record of your course completion or physician checklist

data.name: BasicMedConfirmDelete
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this record? It cannot be undone.

data.name: BasicMedDescription
data.value: Under BasicMed, you can do some types of flying without a current medical certificate if you meet a set of conditions, including (among others) the following (see 14 CFR 61.23 for more details):

data.name: BasicMedErrEventInFuture
data.value: This date is in the future

data.name: BasicMedErrEventTooFarBack
data.value: This date is from before BasicMed went into effect

data.name: BasicMedNoEvents
data.value: You have not entered any courses or physician visits

data.name: BasicMedDescriptionA
data.value: You have held a valid FAA medical at some point since July 15, 2006 (be sure to enter this, even if expired). If you enter a date of a medical certificate it is assumed to meet this requirement.

data.name: BasicMedDescriptionB
data.value: You have taken a course on aero-medical issues within the prior 24 calendar months

data.name: BasicMedDescriptionC
data.value: You have visited a state-licensed physician and completed a checklist within the prior 4 years.

data.name: AboutCloudStorage
data.value: %APP_NAME% can save a backup spreadsheet of your logbook to your cloud drive account

data.name: appDescriptionAircraft
data.value: Manage the aircraft that you fly, and add new models to the system. Define new models of aircraft. Or create a flying club if you share aircraft with others!

data.name: appDescriptionAirports
data.value: View flight routes, see airports that you’ve visited, add missing airports. Try your skills at identifying airports from satellite imagery

data.name: appDescriptionLogbook
data.value: Create or import your flights and see your currency and totals, and do deeper analysis. Download your logbook to a spreadsheet, or print your logbook

data.name: appDescriptionProfile
data.value: Create custom currency rules or deadlines, link to cloud storage and airline scheduling systems

data.name: appDescriptionTraining
data.value: Track progress towards ratings, record endorsements, and manage relationships with students and instructors. Earn badges for flying achievements!

data.name: ProfileBulkDeleteConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete ALL of your flights? This CANNOT be undone!

data.name: ProfileBulkDeleteFlightsPrompt
data.value: If you want to start over with your logbook, you can bulk-delete all of your flights from your account. THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE! Make sure you have a backup first!

data.name: ProfileDeleteAccountConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to close your account? This CANNOT be undone!

data.name: ProfileDeleteAccountPrompt
data.value: While we're sorry to see anybody go, you can close your account at any time. THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE! Make sure you have a backup first!

data.name: CloudAhoyIsAuthed
data.value: You have authorized %APP_NAME% to work with CloudAhoy

data.name: EmailCurrencyExpiration
data.value: Or as needed when currency expires or gets close to expiration

data.name: EmailCurrencyExpirationPromotion
data.value: Support %APP_NAME% for US$15 to get this feature for a year!

data.name: EmailCurrencyExpiringMailSubject
data.value: You have flying currency that has expired or is expiring soon

data.name: ProfileBulkDeleteAircraftPrompt
data.value: Delete all unused aircraft from my account

data.name: TFADisable
data.value: Turn off 2-Factor Authentication for my account

data.name: TFADownloadGoogleAuthenticator
data.value: Download an authenticator app from app to your iOS or Android device.

data.name: TFAIsSetUp
data.value: 2-Factor Authentication is active for your account.

data.name: TFAOverview
data.value: 2-factor authentication (2FA) provides an additional layer of security for your account by requiring a second method in addition to your password to authenticate yourself, making it harder for a hacker to gain access to your account.

data.name: TFARequired
data.value: Because your account has 2-factor authentication turned on, we need to first verify that you are in fact you.

data.name: TFATwoOptionsPrompt
data.value: Using the authenticator app, scan the QR code below with your device's camera, or enter the "secret key" directly.

data.name: TFAUseGA
data.value: %APP_NAME% uses an authentication app that you download to your phone/tablet, such as Google Authenticator or Microsoft Authenticator, for 2-factor authentication. The app provides a time-limited code to enter after providing your password. If you enable 2-factor authentication for your account, then you MUST have access to the app on your phone in order to sign in.

data.name: TFAValidateCodePrompt
data.value: Once you have scanned the QR code or entered the secret key, enter and verify the 6-digit password below:

data.name: TFAUseYourApp
data.value: Use the authenticator app on your phone/tablet to get a current code.

data.name: TFASaveSecretKey
data.value: You should also write down the secret key and keep it in a safe place SEPARATE from any other passwords, so that you can restore access in case you lose your device.

data.name: accountPreferredGreetingNote
data.value: If you leave this blank, your first name will be used

data.name: BigRedButtonsHeader
data.value: Here you can bulk delete unused aircraft, flights, or your entire account.

data.name: accountCellPhoneHint
data.value: (Optional; can help with password reset or if you are in a club)

data.name: err2ndEmailRequired
data.value: Please type your e-mail twice (avoids typos).

data.name: errEmailInUse2
data.value: That email address is already in use by another account

data.name: errEmailRequired
data.value: Please enter a valid email address

data.name: accountDateOfBirthPromptNote
data.value: (Optional, but required in some jurisdictions; Used when printing or computing medical duration)

data.name: accountAlternativeAddressDescription
data.value: You can only sign in or do a password reset using your account's main email address. However, additional verified addresses may be used for sharing flights, requests to sign flights, or requests to set up a student/instructor relationship.

data.name: accountEmailAliasWhy
data.value: Pilots may reach out to other pilots to sign flights, share flights, request club membership, or set up a student/instructor relationship. These messages are encrypted to be usable only by the recipient. Adding an alternate email allows them to send to you at a secondary email address (e.g., if you have a business and a personal email), yet still allows you to handle the request in your account. You CANNOT SIGN IN using any of these addresses.

data.name: accountVerifyEmailExpired
data.value: That link has expired, please use a new one.

data.name: accountVerifyEmailSent
data.value: Message sent. Please check your inbox.

data.name: accountVerifyInvalid
data.value: Something is wrong with the link you clicked. Please try verification again.

data.name: accountVerifyWhy
data.value: To verify your address, an email with a unique link will be sent to you. By clicking on the link, you demonstrate your ability to receive messages at that address. Verification is optional, but can help ensure that you can do things like password resets

data.name: accountEmailAliasDeleteConfirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this email alias? This cannot be undone.

data.name: AuthTokenExpiredPassword
data.value: Your password has changed since this authorization was issued. Please sign out and in again with the new password.

data.name: EmailMonthlySubjectYearInReview
data.value: Your flying totals for {0} and a review of {1}!

data.name: FlyStoIsAuthed
data.value: You have authorized %APP_NAME% to work with FlySto

data.name: AuthorizeBox
data.value: Authorize %APP_NAME% to save backups to your Box account

data.name: DeAuthBox
data.value: De-authorize %APP_NAME% to save backups to your Box account

data.name: BoxIsAuthed
data.value: You have authorized %APP_NAME% to save backups to your Box account.

data.name: NewUserEmailDisclaimer
data.value: Your email address uniquely identifies you, and enables a password reset if you forget it. Don't worry, we don't share it!

data.name: NewUserErrPasswordMismatch
data.value: The password and its confirmation must match

data.name: NewUserEmailAlreadyInUse
data.value: The email address you are trying to use is already in use. If that is your email, please try signing in with it. You can also perform a password reset if needed.

data.name: PasswordQualityHint
data.value: Password must be between 8 and 48 characters. A good password includes numbers, symbols, and both uppercase and lowercase letters

data.name: resetPassEmailPrompt
data.value: Please enter the e-mail address associated with your account:

data.name: resetPassIfNoReceive
data.value: If you don't receive it momentarily...

data.name: resetPassVerifyCorrectEmail
data.value: *Verify that the email address is the one you use for your account*. For security, we don't tell you whether or not an account exists or whether a given email address is associated with an account.

data.name: resetPassQAPrompt
data.value: Please provide the answer to the following question, which you provided when you created your account

data.name: resetPassQANote
data.value: The answer must match EXACTLY, including capitalization, punctuation, and spaces.

data.name: resetPassChooseNew
data.value: Reset Password: Choose a new password

data.name: EmailYearInReviewEndOfYear
data.value: View a review of your flying year to date and share it with your friends!

data.name: EmailYearInReviewAnnual
data.value: Happy New Year! You can find a review of your flying for the whole year last year below. Or, you can view a more comprehensive review of your flying year to date and share it with your friends!

data.name: HomePromoJoinCommunity
data.value: Join 100,000+ pilots worldwide who trust their logbooks to %APP_NAME%

data.name: HomePromoGetStartedHeader
data.value: Getting started is easy. Here's how

data.name: HomePromoStep1
data.value: Sign up - it’s quick and free

data.name: HomePromoStep2
data.value: Add your aircraft (it’s probably already in the system!) or import your flights from another source

data.name: HomePromoStep3
data.value: Enter flights - you can use the web site, or the iOS/Android apps

data.name: HomePromoStep4
data.value: Focus on your flying and let %APP_NAME% take care of tracking totals, currency, endorsements, and more!

data.name: homePromoAreaDesc1
data.value: Add flights (and images!) to your logbook from a browser or iOS/Android apps. Sign flights and track endorsements. Great for general aviation, airline, military, and even drone pilots!

data.name: homePromoAreaDesc2
data.value: View up-to-date totals, 8710 forms, track your progress towards ratings.

data.name: homePromoAreaDesc3
data.value: Track currency (FAA, EASA, others), including medicals flight reviews, duty periods, and maintenance on your aircraft. Even create your own currency rules!

data.name: homePromoAreaDesc4
data.value: Slice and dice your flying by time or aircraft type, see where you've flown, and view trends.

data.name: homePromoAreaDesc5
data.value: Safely and securely share your logbook with instructor, flight schools, employers, or other pilots, or choose from a wide variety of print/PDF layouts.

data.name: homePromoAreaDesc6
data.value: Access your logbook securely from any device anywhere, backup to cloud storage providers, push flights to debriefing services, or pull schedules from airline scheduling systems.

data.name: HomePageMostPopular
data.value: The most popular FREE logbook for pilots worldwide, created by pilots, for pilots

data.name: MetaDescription
data.value: %APP_NAME% is the most popular digital pilot logbook worldwide that helps you track flights, stay current, and securely access your logbook from anywhere. Sign up in seconds and focus on your flying, not your logging!

data.name: WelcomeTitle
data.comment: {0} is replaced by the app name ("MyFlightbook")

data.name: newHomePromoSect1a
data.value: Take your logbook to new heights!

data.name: newHomePromoSect1b
data.value: Log every flight—whether you're in the cockpit of a Cessna, cruising at 35,000 feet in an airliner, flying a military mission, or piloting a drone. %APP_NAME% lets you effortlessly record your flights from any browser or via our free iOS and Android apps.

data.name: newHomePromoSect1c
data.value: You can even bulk-import flights from a spreadsheet or from other popular electronic logbook programs

data.name: newHomePromoSect1d
data.value: Add photos to capture the moment, sign flights digitally, and keep track of endorsements, ratings, and currencies—all in one secure place.

data.name: newHomePromoSect1e
data.value: Built by pilots, for pilots, %APP_NAME% supports all of aviation with powerful tools tailored to your flying life.

data.name: newHomePromoSect2a
data.value: Stay on top of your flying with powerful analytics and tracking tools!

data.name: newHomePromoSect2b
data.value: With real-time access to your up-to-date totals, you’ll always know exactly how much time you have in every aircraft, role, or condition. Whether you're chasing that next rating, preparing for a checkride, or just curious about your flying trends, %APP_NAME% gives you the insights you need.

data.name: newHomePromoSect2c
data.value: Track your progress toward your next certificate or endorsement, identify gaps in your experience, and visualize your path forward, all with clear, customizable reports. With %APP_NAME%’s filtering tools, you can slice and dice your flight history however you like.

data.name: newHomePromoSect2d
data.value: %APP_NAME% supports instructors signing flights and issuing endorsements.

data.name: newHomePromoSect2e
data.value: And when it’s time for the paperwork? From IACRA to insurance forms, %APP_NAME% helps you generate the data you need with just a few clicks—so you can spend less time at your desk and more time in the air.

data.name: newHomePromoSect3a
data.value: Confidence in the cockpit starts with knowing you are current and %APP_NAME% makes it easy to track it all.

data.name: newHomePromoSect3b
data.value: Whether you fly under FAA, EASA, or another authority, %APP_NAME% helps you stay on top of every regulation and requirement.

data.name: newHomePromoSect3c
data.value: From flight reviews to instrument proficiency, medical expirations to night currency, everything is tracked automatically so you are always ready for your next flight.

data.name: newHomePromoSect3d
data.value: Monitor your flight, duty, and rest limits with precision, and manage aircraft maintenance alongside your own qualifications

data.name: newHomePromoSect3e
data.value: Have your own requirements to meet? No problem. %APP_NAME% lets you create custom currency rules tailored to your specific operation or organization. It is a perfect fit for flight schools, corporate operators, and international pilots alike.

data.name: newHomePromoSect3f
data.value: Have peace of mind knowing you are always flying legally, safely, and fully compliant

data.name: newHomePromoSect4a
data.value: Need a professional logbook for an interview? A clean summary for your insurance provider? A progress report for your CFI? %APP_NAME% lets you generate polished, professional-grade PDF and print layouts customized to your needs.

data.name: newHomePromoSect4b
data.value: Choose from a wide range of formats—from traditional Jeppesen- or EASA-style logbooks to airline-style grids. Add the details that matter most, including signatures, remarks, and even images.

data.name: newHomePromoSect4c
data.value: Whether you’re on your first lesson or your 10,000th hour, %APP_NAME% ensures your logbook is always ready to impress.

data.name: newHomePromoSect5a
data.value: Share your flying story: securely, beautifully, and on your terms!

data.name: newHomePromoSect5b
data.value: Whether you're applying to an airline or just want to show your instructor how much progress you've made, %APP_NAME% makes sharing easy and secure.

data.name: newHomePromoSect5c
data.value: Grant read-only or editable access to instructors, flight schools, employers, or fellow pilots instantly, and with full control over what they see.

data.name: newHomePromoSect6a
data.value: Fly anywhere, access everywhere. Your logbook goes where you go with %APP_NAME%

data.name: newHomePromoSect6b
data.value: No matter where your flying takes you—across the country or across the globe—your flight log is always within reach.

data.name: newHomePromoSect6c
data.value: %APP_NAME% gives you secure, cloud-based access from any device, whether you’re logging a flight from the cockpit, reviewing totals on your tablet, or prepping for a checkride on your computer.

data.name: newHomePromoSect6d
data.value: Your flying life is connected. %APP_NAME% keeps it all in sync—securely, reliably, and effortlessly.

data.name: newHomePromoSect7a
data.value: Sync seamlessly with the tools you already use. Automatically back up your data to leading cloud storage services for extra peace of mind.

data.name: newHomePromoSect7b
data.value: Push your flights to popular debriefing platforms like CloudAhoy or FlySto to analyze every maneuver

data.name: newHomePromoSect7c
data.value: Pull flight schedules directly from supported airline scheduling systems to make logging easier than ever.

data.name: newHomePromoSect8a
data.value: Ditch the paper without losing your history. %APP_NAME% makes the switch seamless.

data.name: newHomePromoSect8b
data.value: We get it: moving from a handwritten logbook to a digital one (or from other digital solutions) can feel like a big leap. That’s why %APP_NAME% is designed to make the transition as smooth and low-pressure as possible.

data.name: newHomePromoSect8c
data.value: Just enter your starting totals and start logging new flights electronically—no scanning, no stress. From that point forward, you're set up for a lifetime of smart, secure, and streamlined logging. Or, import from a spreadsheet or other digital logbook,

data.name: newHomePromoSect8d
data.value: Want to add those old pen-and-ink entries someday? Go for it! On your own time. Whether you want a complete digital archive or just feel nostalgic about your early flying days, you can always go back and enter those flights when you're ready.

data.name: newHomePromoSect8e
data.value: %APP_NAME% is as flexible as you are! Need instructor signatures to keep things official? No problem. Easily send a batch of signature requests for past flights, and your instructors can digitally sign them with just a few clicks.

data.name: newHomePromoSect8f
data.value: The result? A logbook that’s not only flexible and compliant, but beautifully organized and ready for anything!
